exclusion.criterion: Co-infection with hepatitis B or HIV
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Hepatocellular carcinoma evaluated by ultrasound and alpha-fetoprotein
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Neutrophil count below 1500 per cubic millimetre
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Platelet count below 75000 per cubic millimetre
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has chronic HCV infection and is on combination therapy. No evidence of exclusion criteria.
